testQuestions.question: Which ClearPath plan has the highest deductible?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath HDHP has the highest deductible at 1800 for individuals and 3600 for families.

testQuestions.question: Which plans have the lowest primary care copay?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Advance has the lowest primary care copay at 10 dollars.

testQuestions.question: Which plans are best for families looking for the lowest out-of-pocket maximum?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath HDHP offers the lowest family out-of-pocket maximum at 12000, making it the best choice for families prioritizing total cost protection.

testQuestions.question: Which plan provides the best coverage for maternity delivery costs?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Advance Plus offers the best maternity delivery coverage with 20 percent after deductible, which is more favorable than the per-day charges found in High.

testQuestions.question: Which plans have zero-cost telehealth?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Advance, Standard, Advance Plus, and High all offer zero-dollar telehealth visits.

testQuestions.question: Which plan is best for someone who wants an HSA?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath HDHP is the only plan eligible for an HSA, offering 1000 for individuals and 2000 for families in contributions.

testQuestions.question: Which plan offers the lowest specialist copay?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Advance offers the lowest specialist visit copay at 30 dollars. HDHP may cost less in rare cases but only after meeting deductible.

testQuestions.question: Which plans include preventive dental benefits?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Standard and ClearPath High offer preventive dental coverage.

testQuestions.question: Which plans have the lowest individual deductible?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Advance Plus has the lowest individual deductible at 200.

testQuestions.question: Which plan is best for someone who sees an internal medicine provider frequently?
testQuestions.answer: ClearPath Standard and ClearPath High are strong options because they include several internal medicine providers in-network and offer predictable copays.

testQuestions.question: Give me all providers in Hutchinson, Kansas.
testQuestions.answer: Here are the in-network providers located in Hutchinson, Kansas.
